# Cerebras

Use `cerebras/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "cerebras-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "cerebras/gpt-oss-120b",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `CEREBRAS_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/cerebras`

## Default base URL

Not listed.

You can override the base URL by setting `CEREBRAS_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://inference-docs.cerebras.ai/models/overview
